mapper.sql: e_id, house_id, customer_id, customer_info, start_time, end_time_estimate, end_time_actual, order_customer_id, fee_total, user_id, e_state, e_price
mapper.insert:

e_id,
house_id,
customer_id,
customer_info,
start_time,
end_time_estimate,

order_customer_id,

mapper.update:
update enter1
house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customer_info = #{customerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time_estimate = #{endTimeEstimate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time_actual = #{endTimeActual,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_customer_id = #{orderCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fee_total = #{feeTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
e_state = #{eState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
e_price = #{ePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update enter1 set house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_info = #{customerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time_estimate = #{endTimeEstimate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time_actual = #{endTimeActual,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_customer_id = #{orderCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee_total = #{feeTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_state = #{eState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_price = #{ePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT customer1.c_id, customer1.c_name, customer1.c_card, customer1.c_phone, customer1.c_account, customer1.c_password, customer1.role, enter1.e_id, enter1.house_id, enter1.customer_id, enter1.customer_info, enter1.start_time, enter1.end_time_estimate, enter1.end_time_actual, enter1.order_customer_id, enter1.fee_total, enter1.user_id, enter1.e_state, enter1.e_price, house1.h_id, house1.h_name, house1.h_amount, house1.h_price, house1.floor_id, house1.h_state, house1.customer_id, house1.h_info, fee1.f_id, fee1.enter_id, fee1.direct, fee1.coustomer_id, fee1.money, fee1.house_id, fee1.description, fee1.user_id FROM enter1 INNER JOIN customer1 ON customer1.c_id = enter1.customer_id INNER JOIN house1 ON enter1.house_id = house1.h_id INNER JOIN fee1 ON enter1.e_id = fee1.enter_id
